thread.title: How the Sartorialist makes street style click

author: pbs.org
title: How the Sartorialist makes street style click
text: Scott Schuman, better known as the Sartorialist, captures examples of street style around the world to post on his popular blog. Heâ€™s not documenting not fashion trends exactly, but something more individual and personal. Jeffrey Brown talked to the photographer, author of the upcoming "The Sartorialist X," during New York Fashion Week.
